metadata.title: CVE-2021-33930 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in function pool_installable_whatprovides insrc/repo.h in libsolv before 0.7.17 allows attackers to cause a Denial ofService.

criterions.comment: libsolv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
